materials.notes: Foundational methods textbook covering social scientific research methods, academic communication, and study skills. Essential guide for learning how to work scientifically in sociology, political science, and administrative science. Covers research process, reading/writing academic texts, literature research, and preparing assignments including the Bachelor thesis.
